description: The image captures a serene landscape view from a high vantage point, overlooking a vast expanse of wooded hills and distant flatlands under a clear blue sky. In the foreground, a large, moss-covered stone stands prominently, resembling a tombstone but with no discernible inscriptions. This stone, casting a long shadow on the ground, adds a mysterious element to the otherwise tranquil natural scene. The landscape is dotted with patches of yellow blossoms, enhancing the vibrant and refreshing atmosphere of this outdoor setting.
poem:
There once was a stone on a hill,
With moss that was green and still,
It overlooked trees,
And a breeze that would please,
In a scene that was peaceful and chill.
